scripts.backend:build: cd backend && pyinstaller --noconfirm --onefile --console --name nftool-backend --clean --collect-submodules torch --collect-submodules scipy --collect-submodules sklearn --collect-data plotly --collect-data kaleido run_tauri.py
scripts.test:e2e: export NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8001 && export NEXT_PUBLIC_API_KEY=nftool-dev-key && (fuser -k 8001/tcp || true) && (cd backend && export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:. && .venv/bin/python src/api.py &) && (cd frontend && npx playwright install chromium) && sleep 5 && (cd frontend && npx playwright test)
